Highlights

(click to hide the content below) (click to show the content below)

To Plan for the Future, Harpoon Brewery Looked to Its People

“Love Beer. Love Life.” is the motto of Harpoon—and also the community-minded ethos that guided the company to transfer partial ownership to its most passionate supporters: its employees.

Read the Story about To Plan for the Future, Harpoon Brewery Looked to Its People

The Road-Trip of a Lifetime for Black Entrepreneurs

Thirty rising black tech entrepreneurs joined JPMorgan Chase bankers on a five-day startup boot camp on a bus.

Read the Story The Road-Trip of a Lifetime for Black Entrepreneurs

How to Support Female Diversity...And the Innovation Economy

Melissa Smith, head of specialized industries for middle market banking at JPMorgan Chase, discusses how to support the sectors that are at the forefront of innovation and entrepreneurship.

Watch the Video How to Support Female Diversity...And the Innovation Economy

Bringing Cajun Cuisine to the Heart of D.C.

JPMorgan Chase and Wacif ensured that family-owned Po Boy Jim was able to open and deliver uniquely crafted food to eager D.C. residents.

Read the Story Bringing Cajun Cuisine to the Heart of D.C.

Leading By Example: How to Increase Diversity in Tech

Having a diverse talent pool is the best way to foster new ways of thinking.

Read the StoryLeading By Example: How to Increase Diversity in Tech

Keep Trucking: JPMorgan Chase’s Support for Strivers in DFW

Diana Martinez is celebrating her 10th anniversary as a business owner in Dallas-Fort Worth this year.

Read the StoryKeep Trucking: JPMorgan Chase’s Support for Strivers in DFW

Students like Marjolaine George Take on the Working World

Les Compagnons is a two-year, residential program offering on-the-job training for students in Paris.

Watch the Video Students like Marjolaine George Take on the Working World

Nonprofit Cuts Down Paper Trawl with Digital Refresh

A Dallas-Fort Worth re-skilling center gets to kick its filing cabinets to the curb and store documents in the cloud, a move that impacts hundreds of people and their families.

Read the StoryNonprofit Cuts Down Paper Trawl with Digital Refresh

These are the stories of the neighborhoods, businesses, programs and ideas that are moving our communities forward.
